Room.Name: The Invisible Hand Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Invisible Hand's premire training center for thieves.
Room.LongDescription: Congratulations on making it to the training room! You may train here and advance to the next level. However, when you are ready to go to level seven, you will have to find another training place. Perhaps you should ask the little match girl if she knows where higher level thieves are supposed to train.
